title: 3dAutoTcorrelate
description: Computes the correlation coefficient between the time series of each pair of voxels in the input dataset

pearson.title: Pearson Correlation Flag
pearson.description: Correlation is the normal Pearson (product moment) correlation coefficient [default]

eta2.title: Eta^2 Measure Flag
eta2.description: Output is eta^2 measure from Cohen et al., NeuroImage, 2008

polort.title: Polynomial Trend Removal Order
polort.description: Remove polynomial trend of order 'm', for m=-1..3.

autoclip.title: Autoclip Flag
autoclip.description: Clip off low-intensity regions in the dataset

mask_source.title: Mask Source
mask_source.description: Provide output for voxels only in specified mask

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Save output into dataset with specified prefix

out1d.title: Output 1D File
out1d.description: Save output in a text file in 1D format

mmap.title: Mmap Flag
mmap.description: Write .BRIK results to disk directly using Unix mmap()
